name: Validation of air data inputs
description: The flight control computer shall perform range and consistency checks on airspeed and Mach number inputs at a rate of at least 50 Hz.
embedding_text: Validation of air data inputs. The flight control computer shall perform range and consistency checks on airspeed and Mach number inputs at a rate of at least 50 Hz.

name: Control law reversion timing
description: Upon detection of invalid air data, the flight control computer shall transition from normal law to alternate law within 100 milliseconds.
embedding_text: Control law reversion timing. Upon detection of invalid air data, the flight control computer shall transition from normal law to alternate law within 100 milliseconds.

name: Inhibition of air-data-dependent functions
description: When operating in alternate control law due to air data failure, airspeed-dependent flight envelope protections shall be inhibited.
embedding_text: Inhibition of air-data-dependent functions. When operating in alternate control law due to air data failure, airspeed-dependent flight envelope protections shall be inhibited.

name: Primary flight display fault annunciation
description: The system shall annunciate a flight control system fault on the primary flight display using standard caution or warning symbology.
embedding_text: Primary flight display fault annunciation. The system shall annunciate a flight control system fault on the primary flight display using standard caution or warning symbology.

name: Air data sensor retry mechanism
description: The system shall retry acquisition of air data sensor values up to three times before declaring the sensor invalid.
embedding_text: Air data sensor retry mechanism. The system shall retry acquisition of air data sensor values up to three times before declaring the sensor invalid.

name: High-rate recording of raw air data parameters
description: The system shall record raw air data parameters at a minimum rate of 200 Hz for engineering analysis.
embedding_text: High-rate recording of raw air data parameters. The system shall record raw air data parameters at a minimum rate of 200 Hz for engineering analysis.

name: Adaptive sensor polling for power optimization
description: The system shall dynamically adjust sensor polling rates during steady-state flight to reduce power consumption.
embedding_text: Adaptive sensor polling for power optimization. The system shall dynamically adjust sensor polling rates during steady-state flight to reduce power consumption.

name: Detection of non-critical sensor degradation
description: The system shall detect degraded performance of non-critical sensors and classify them as failed or degraded based on predefined thresholds.
embedding_text: Detection of non-critical sensor degradation. The system shall detect degraded performance of non-critical sensors and classify them as failed or degraded based on predefined thresholds.

name: Functional isolation following partial sensor failure
description: Upon detection of a degraded non-critical sensor, only the functions dependent on that sensor shall be disabled while maintaining overall flight control.
embedding_text: Functional isolation following partial sensor failure. Upon detection of a degraded non-critical sensor, only the functions dependent on that sensor shall be disabled while maintaining overall flight control.

name: Monitoring of actuator command-response consistency
description: The system shall monitor the difference between commanded and measured actuator positions to detect actuator faults.
embedding_text: Monitoring of actuator command-response consistency. The system shall monitor the difference between commanded and measured actuator positions to detect actuator faults.
